title: The Art of Minimalist UX
author: Tinh Nguyen
summary: Why doing less often achieves more in the world of user experience design.
content:
Minimalism isn't just about white space; it's about clarity of purpose. Every pixel should serve a function.

## Reducing Cognitive Load
By removing unnecessary elements, we allow users to focus on what matters. This leads to higher conversion rates and better user satisfaction.

## Intentionality in Motion
Animations should only exist to provide feedback or guide the user, not just for the sake of being flashy.
